name: CrabLoop
description:
Follow a crab along a life changing journey through space and time. Who knows what it will find... A piece of candy? Some coins? Maybe the real treasure is the friends we made along the way :)

Created by Squiggle for the NOKIA 3310 JAM 5 (2023)

--Controls--

W/Left Arrow - Move Left

D/Right Arrow - Move Right

Space Bar - Snip

R - Restart
